transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ji, hello.
Customer: Good evening sir, Solar Green Energy House mein hi baat ho rahi hai na?
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Haan sir, maine call kiya tha, main Ankita baat kar rahi hu Indiamart team se senior manager. Sir kya abhi aap free hai, baat ho sakti hai aapse?
Customer: Ji, hum free hai mam, bataiye.
Executive: Haan sir, mere call karne ka reason hai, abhi Indiamart pe aapka discussion aapke account manager Mohit se hua tha, right?
Customer: Ji, right.
Executive: To jiski regarding aapne express kiya hai ki aap satisfied nahi rahe us call se ya Indiamart se?
Customer: Ji mam, humko mere mere mere according inquiry nahi aa raha hai mam. Hamare kshetra ka lead humko nahi mil pa raha hai.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Sir jaise ki aap solar power system, off grid solar power plant inme hi deal kar rahe hai, right?
Customer: Ji, ji, right.
Executive: Aur aapko Mohania ke near by chahiye ya pan India deal kar rahe hai?
Customer: Mam humko Mohania Mohania ke near by Mohania aur Rohtas aur aur idhar ha Mohania ke near by chahiye. Aur Rohtas ke near by chahiye, do district.
Executive: Sir pura Bihar nahi cover kar sakte?
Customer: Kar sakte hai mam, baki jyada Bihar mein jyada log hai isliye sahi kaam nahi ho paata hai. Baki aap main hai ki Mohania, Sasaram.
Executive: Mohania to already.
Customer: Boliye. Kya mam?
Executive: Main ye kehna chah rahi thi jaise ki Mohania se aapka registration hai. To waha pe to log aapko already jante bhi honge. Kahi na kahi aapka business bhi chal raha hoga. Indiamart se agar aap aaye hai to business ke growth ke liye aaye honge ki aapka business aur increase ho. To pehla to mera suggestion hai ki aap kam se kam aath se 10 cities ki lead lijiye. Aur aath se 10 cities ko cover karenge to opportunity bhi jyada rahegi. Rahi baat sir aapke paas inquiry ka jo count aa raha hai. Aapke paas May, June mein inquiry ka count kafi achcha aaya tha. Matlab aapke paas 102 inquiry bhi aayi thi June ke month mein. Kuch time ke baad abhi aapka inquiry kam hua hai. To kya iska koi season wagera bhi hota hai ki kisi season mein aapka matlab inquiry jyada aaye?
Customer: Nahi season season nahi hota hai. Main hota hai ki hamare like hamare ko lead nahi aa raha hai. Ab kya reason hai, samajh mein nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Haan sir pehle to ek cheez main ispe correct karana chahungi jaise aapne UTL 2KW on grid solar system dal rakha hai, thik hai?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Aap ek aapka product add hona chahiye solar power system ke name se. Sirf solar power system ke name se aapko product add karwaiye. Jisse kya hoga ki agar solar power system ke name se bhi lead generate hoti hai to aap usko bata sakte ho ki UTL ke 2KW on grid solar system mein aap deal kar rahe ho. Usi tarike se aapka ek solar hybrid ke name se main add karwa rahi hongi abhi profile mein. Solar inverter batteries ye teen category main add karwa rahi hu. Jisse aapki kahi na kahi search badhegi aur inquiry badhegi.
Customer: Ji mam.
Executive: Haan to sir ye bataiye sir aap services pe thoda kam active reh rahe hai lead wagera kab consume karte hai? Agar aap services pe kam active rahenge to lead bhi fir kam aayegi, inquiry bhi kam aayegi.
Customer: Mam hamare like mam hamare liye nahi to hum kaha se active usko kaha se consume karenge?
Executive: Correct last aapne last aapne 28 October ko bylead li thi. Kya 28 October ke baad ek bhi lead nahi aayi hai?
Customer: Nahi mam, nahi aayi hai tabhi to hum nahi kiye hai.
Executive: Services kaise use karte hai aap se ya computer se?
Customer: Mobile app se, mobile app se.
Executive: Mobile app se refresh karke check karte hai ya nahi?
Customer: Ji refresh karte hai mam.
Executive: Aur filter wagera use karte hai city ka filter aur reh gayi baat order value ka filter?
Customer: Haan ye sab karte hai.
Executive: Patna Bihar ke lead Navada Bihar ye sab jagah ke lead nahi use kar sakte?
Customer: Hai kar sakte hai agar thik thak rahega tab na mam. Thik thak rehta hi nahi to kaha se fir hum karenge?
Executive: Char panch leads available hai sir dekhiye ek Araria ke lead aa rakhi hai off grid solar system ki. Ek aayi hai yaha pe Udasi Ganj Bihar ke solar rooftop system ki. Main aapko ek cheez batati hu sir agar aap din ki ek bylead bhi consume kar rahe hai relevant bylead to aapka account kahi na kahi active dikhta hai. Fir aapki visibility bhi maintain rehti hai. Visibility ka matlab Indiamart ke page pe aap dikhte reh rahe ho. To aapko buyer call karega inquiry karega. But jaise aap service char panch din use karna band kar dete ho to aapka jo Indiamart pe account hai wo page pe kahi down ho jata hai, niche ki or chala jata hai. To fir kya hota hai ki aapka competitor dikh raha hai to uske paas inquiry ja rahi hai aapke paas nahi ja rahi hai. To sabse pehle to aapko har din ek bylead consume karna hi hai. Agar aapne har din ek bylead consume karna start kar diya aap dekho aapke paas call bhi aayegi aur inquiry bhi aayegi.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Aap Indiamart ka app download kar rakha hai aapne aap din mein kisi ek time pe login kijiye. Indiamart ke panel pe jaake recent ke tab pe click kijiye recent lead hoga ya latest bylead. Latest bylead mein aap 10-15 lead padhiye usme se aapko ek ya do sahi milegi hi milegi. Aur roz ek do lead pe baat kijiye. Jab aapka account active ho jayega pura ek week mein aap dekho ki aapka visibility pehle aa jayega matlab aapki jo city hai usme aap pehle dikhne lagoge. Jab pehle dikhoge aap to buyer aapko call bhi karega inquiry bhi karega.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: To ye sari cheeze karni padegi sir tabhi aapko result bhi milega.
Customer: Mam hamara jo hai kya bolte hai jo mera profile hai isko thoda sa upgrade kara dijiye badhiya level pe aap logo ko pata hoga bahut sare solar division ka kaam karte honge. Thik hai mam uske according mera thoda sa jo profile hai high five thoda sa badhiya se thik thak se designing wagera kara karke aur jo system ko solar sambandhit apna kaam hai inverter battery on grid off grid hybrid ye teeno mein division apna. Sir isi service mein karana hai ye services upgrade karwana hai?
Customer: Ji upgrade karwana hai isi mein solar division mein hi.
Executive: Isi service mein karwana hai ya naya package lena hai isse upar ka?
Customer: Nahi nahi naya package nahi lena hai isi service mein.
Executive: Thik hai thik hai isi ke samajh gaye. Abhi dekho sir maine aapko kya bola main abhi teen ye add karwa rahi hu aapke paas category solar power system aap deal kar rahe ho is name se solar inverter battery ke name se solar hybrid system ke name se ye teeno keyword jab add honge to thoda sa search aur achcha hoga. Dusra sir main aapka jo product ki detail hai description hai ye sab dobara check karwa leti hu ki isme aur main kya sahi kara sakte ho. Jarurat padegi to aapse Mohit jo hai Mohit aapke account manager wo kuch detail bhi mangenge ki sir ye sari cheeze add karna hai detail aap de dijiye. To aap detail de dijiyega humko, thik hai? Aur sir mera ek humble request hai ki aap daily ki ek bylead consume karna start kijiye. Taki aapka account active rahe aur hum usse kaam kar paaye.
Customer: Thik hai mam, karte hai.
Executive: Sir to aap coordinate to karenge na jo details chahiye rahegi aap doge na?
Customer: Ji ji denge, kyu nahi denge mam?
Executive: Thik hai thik hai. Main Mohit ko bolti hu wo aapko whatsapp karenge ek do pictures bhi chahiye honge product ke wo bhi aap provide kara dijiyega, thik hai?
Customer: Thik hai thik hai.
Executive: Sir jo bhi cheeze hamara discussion hua na call pe ye recording call chal rahi hai to mere call ke regarding aapko ek feedback aayega agar aapko mera suggestion sahi laga ho to please aap satisfied mark karenge.
Customer: Thik hai. Thik hai, thank you. Thik hai, thank you mam.
Executive: Okay sir whatsapp pe aap please details provide kijiyega, okay?
Customer: Thik hai. Okay sir, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving enough relevant buyleads.

- Dissatisfied with current lead quality.

- Wants leads from specific districts only.



Resolution:

- Executive added solar power system category.

- Executive added solar hybrid category.

- Executive will have product details re-checked.

- Executive requested daily bylead consumption.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to provide details via WhatsApp.

- Mohit will WhatsApp customer for product pictures.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, profile upgrade, visibility
